data.name: RTK13 - Hero Mode Additional Stage Set 4 英傑伝追加ステージセット④
data.detailed_description:
Four stages will be added to Hero Mode: "Death of the Wei Emperor," "Rise Emperor of Wu," "The Sleeping Dragon Ascends," and "A Dream of Heroes."
"Death of the Wei Emperor" and "Rise Emperor of Wu" are story/movie only stages.

▼The Sleeping Dragon Ascends
The main character is an aged Zhuge Liang. Liu Bei is gone and his own life is soon to end. This faithful man ventures his own life in a final effort to fulfill a promise.

▼A Dream of Heroes
The main character is Zhuge Liang's protoge, Jiang Wei. After a successful northern campagn, where will he turn? A final battle, never recorded in the history books is about to begin.

data.short_description: Four stages will be added to Hero Mode: "Death of the Wei Emperor," "Rise Emperor of Wu," "The Sleeping Dragon Ascends," and "A Dream of Heroes." "Death of the Wei Emperor" and "Rise Emperor of Wu" are story/movie only stages.

fullgame.name: ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIII / 三國志13

data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Pentium®4 1.6GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 256MB over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 512MB over
